A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a really terrible movie but not a super great one either. Just as Force Awakens was A New Hope\, The Last Jedi is Empire... or at least tries to be. Some of the humor falls flat. Some of the plots do too. I have to say I enjoyed Luke and Rey's plot the most. I personally didn't mind how they developed Luke for this story--quasi old gunslinger tried of\, well\, everything.
